name: fancy-events
description: A small and fast event emitter for node.js and browser with wildcards and regular expressions

scripts.build: rollup --config rollup.config.js --bundleConfigAsCjs && tsc src/index.ts --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --target ES2020 --outDir dist && mv dist/index.d.ts dist/fancy-events.d.ts

author: Syneware
